trans-unit.source: Represents the metrics used to lay out a character in a device font.
trans-unit.target: 代表用來配置中的裝置字型度量資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> object is constructed using the default metric values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>預設度量值建構物件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class by specifying the metrics as a string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>類別藉由指定為字串的度量。

trans-unit.source: The `metrics` parameter is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: `metrics`參數是以逗號分隔的字串，指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>屬性順序如下:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>前兩個屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，所需。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 不過，其他五個屬性是選擇性的並會預設為零如果未指定。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "0.75,0.75,,0.1" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定"0.75,0.75,,0.1"的字串值`metrics`參數， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>屬性會設定-未指定的屬性會設定為零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited <xref:System.String> value that represents the metrics for the character.
trans-unit.target: 以逗號分隔<xref:System.String>值，表示字元的度量。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline value for the character.
trans-unit.target: 取得字元的基準值。

trans-unit.source: The return value represents the vertical offset from the bottom of the black box to the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值表示基準黑色方塊下方的垂直位移。

trans-unit.source: A positive value indicates the baseline is above the bottom of the black box, while a negative value indicates the baseline is below the bottom of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 正值表示基準高於黑色方塊的下一個負數值表示基準黑色方塊下方。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 型別的值<xref:System.Double>表示基準。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: 取得字元黑色方塊的高度。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box height.
trans-unit.target: 型別的值<xref:System.Double>代表黑色方塊高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: 取得字元黑色方塊的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box width.
trans-unit.target: 型別的值<xref:System.Double>代表黑色方塊寬度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space below the black box.
trans-unit.target: 取得建議的泛空白字元，黑色方塊下方。

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 負數值表示突出部分。

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and BottomSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的換頁字元是屬性值的總和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，與 bottomsidebearing 的加總。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 垂直進階不能小於零。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>值

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>物件是否相等的下列屬性是否相等︰ <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref>比較目前物件<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash code from the metric values of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立雜湊程式碼度量值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>值

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the left of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 取得建議的泛空白字元，黑色方塊的左邊。

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 負數值表示突出部分。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values LeftSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 水平的換頁字元是 LeftSideBearing 的屬性值的總和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 水平遞增不能小於零。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>值

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a comma-delimited string representing metric values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以逗號分隔的字串，表示度量值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>值是以逗號分隔的字串，指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>屬性順序如下:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>前兩個屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，所需。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 不過，其他五個屬性是選擇性的並會預設為零如果未指定。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您指定的字串值"`0.75,0.75,,0.1`」 的`metrics`參數， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>屬性會設定-未指定的屬性會設定為零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>值

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the right of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 取得建議的泛空白字元，黑色方塊的右邊。

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 負數值表示突出部分。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and RightSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: 水平的換頁字元是屬性值的總和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>，與 rightsidebearing 的加總。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 水平遞增不能小於零。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>值

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: 取得建議的泛空白字元，黑色方塊上方。

trans-unit.source: Recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: 建議的黑色方塊上方的泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values TopSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的換頁字元是屬性 TopSideBearing 值的總和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 垂直進階不能小於零。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>值
